Index.overview: I'm a skilled software developer with experience in TypeScript and JavaScript, and expertise in frameworks like React, Node.js, and Three.js. I'm a quick learner and collaborate closely with clients to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!

Index.mvp_of_teamwork: Working with him has been an absolute game-changer! Not only does he write clean, efficient code, but he's always ready to help the team when we're stuck. I remember this one time we had a tight deadline, and he stayed late to help us all get the project done. Definitely the MVP of teamwork!
Index.lone_wolf_of_productivity: Honestly, he's the type of person who can handle any task solo while still delivering top-quality work. I've been a tester for many different developers, but his code has the fewest bugs. And most importantly, he has such a positive attitude - never complains no matter how heavy the workload gets.
Index.after_hours_hero: What impresses me most about him is his incredibly creative problem-solving skills. There were complex requirements that our team thought were impossible, but he always found elegant and efficient solutions. Plus, his communication skills are excellent - he explains technical stuff to non-tech team members in a way that's really easy to understand.

Index.projects_description: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos in it. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively
